name: Eat My Photons!
overview: In Eat My photons! the player fights the enemy in space in a Stellar Mission via a space ship or on the ground in a space all-terrain vehicle. In flight, the player has lasers and a limited supply of smart missiles. When on the ground deadly drones are swarming the player's outpost in space and are trying to hunt him/her down. The player can choose between Stellar or Ground missions on each level. The game features various terrains("Polar, equatorial, and temperate regions"), and random scenarios put together to give the player more challenge and replay value.
